description: Super-cozy one bedroom apartment with a warm atmosphere in the heart of Greenwich Village. Tons of restaurants, bars, and more around, but the apartment is QUIET. Contact me for additional pictures and information!
name: Quiet and cozy apartment in Greenwich Village
review: As the description says, this place is located in a quiet area, so you will be able to get a full night of sleep.  The place is very clean and located next to many great shops and restaurants.  Due to considerable snow, the original plan for key pickup did not go as originally planned due to local businesses being closed.  The host, while away across the country, was able to get a key delivered to me via a driver when I arrived at the place.  Therefore, the host went out of her way to make sure I could get in and was not waiting out in the cold.
